## ChatPopUpProps.ctaLabel property

The "Call to Action" label to be displayed next to the popup button. By default, the CTA is not shown. This prop will override the "showInitialMessagePopUp" prop, if specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
ctaLabel?: string;
```
